ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "D&S Sales Analyst" ), SBU__c = "D&S", or( Text( Type__c ) = 'Booked'
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This type of record can only be changed by an Administrator.
